features: 【Compact Handheld Steamer for Clothes】Tzmovqix clothes steamer can heats up quickly taking only 20s to reach the optimal temperature,and then continuous steam output effectively removes creases and wrinkles from clothing making it ideal to take on holiday or travelling for work.

【Multifunctional Lroning Machine】Garment steamer for clothes suitable for all types of fabric, including delicate silk and lace, as well as cotton,wool and denim.Safe to use on all fabrics and suitable for clothes, curtains, furniture, plush toys and so much more.

【Anti Leak Design】Travel clothes steamer adopt 360° leak proof technology.When first switching on let the steam flow through before aiming at your item to steam as once the steam starts water doesn't spit or leak.Our power cord have 185cm/73inch, It is enough for life and travel.

【Perfect for Travelling】Clothes iron steamer is portable,foldable,lightweight,powerful,compact.It was absolutely perfect for travelling,It folds up so it is easy to store and carry in a suitcase or bag making and will take up less space but it still very powerful for it works on all fabric materials and also can work horizontally and vertically.
【 Handheld teamers Satisfaction Guaranteed】 We offer a 365-day exclusive warranty with all our products.If you have any issue Please contact after-sales service online.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Replaceable Brush Heads This clothes steamers has additional removable Hair brushes.Smoothes wrinkles and removes lint from clothes at the same time Support Hang Ironing This travel iron steam mini works great in both hang ironing and flat ironing. Hand ironing is the steam mode while flat ironing is dry ironing. Support Flat Ironing The 2 in 1 Fabric Wrinkle Remover and Steam Clothing Iron is designed with Unique Leak-Proof Technology, anti-drip & anti-spill, allowing you to steam from any angle - vertically, horizontally or even upside down. Can be used as an iron with or without steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is perfect for on the go traveling or just to keep things compact at home. It's very easy to use and gets hot FAST. It works very well and gets the wrinkles out in no time. It's very light weight and easy to use. Just remember to empty the water after each use. This thing is a must if you're constantly ironing clothes. It's perfect for shirts, jackets, pants and even curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had this shipped to my mom's house for Christmas and I used it for steaming clothes wrinkled in my suitcase. Overall it is very easy to use and worked exactly as planned. It would have been nice if the box had directions on the outside or better yet pictures with directions. The manual was tiny and I didn't bother to read it but figured it out without much effort. I like that it comes with a small cup for pouring water where it needs to go. It takes 20 seconds to warm up and then it makes quick work of wrinkles. Everything folds up neatly and fits into a little travel bag that comes with it and the whole thing fit neatly into my baggage. Really good product for those of us living in small apartments also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this steamer because it's something that I always wanted to have for traveling purposes and to also use at times when I didn't feel like using the regular iron to take wrinkles out of clothes. I have yet to take it out the box to put it to use, but when I do, I will update this post to give a more detailed review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really nice compact product
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed by how small the steamer was able to fold up. Ergonomically, it is very easy to use and heats up quickly. It does have a smaller reservoir than some for water but unless one is doing several articles of clothing in a row it should not be too much of an issue. Seems well-made and thought out- nice for traveling and to keep up in the closet for once in a while to get those wrinkles out of that shirt you are determined to wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this steamer. Will be using it a lot
reviews.reviewText: I love this clothes steamer. It heats up quickly and continuously uses steam to remove creases and wrinkles. I tried it on a pair of cotton knit pants and a cotton blouse. The wrinkles came out of both items really quickly and they were not to wet to put the clothes on immediately. This steamer is compact, easy to use and will be great for travel. I will be using this a lot.

A travel steamer is one of those things you never thought you needed, but comes in handy whenever the situation calls for it.For me, it was a last minute overnight trip when I was invited to a formal dinner/celebration. I had to bring my formal wear--3 piece suit, dress shirt, tie, the whole shebang--and it had to fit in my carrying size suitcase for easy transportation via the back of a sedan. However we all know that my (as well as everyone else's) outfit is gonne be wrinkled af once I take it out and hang it up. If only I had a steamer with me....And that's where this comes in! It won't rival your sfully decked out steamed you may have at home, but it's not supposed to; it serves as a much more convenient solution when in the go or constantly traveling for business trips or situation that require formal wear and you NEED to get rid of those wrinkles ASAP. It steams clothes pretty well for something so small and compact, and the handle folds down to a more travel-friendly size.So is it the BEST steamer? No. Is it one of the best travel steamers you can get at this price point and a handy travel partner? Yes!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ideal garment steamer for when travelling
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for a small portable garment steamer for when I go on trips. This Tzmovqix Portable Iron is exactly what I needed. It is small, foldable and light and more importantly - it works! No matter how I pack my cotton and linen clothes they always get wrinkled and need ironing before I put them on. The steam iron gets the wrinkles and creases out quickly and leaves my clothes clean and sanitized. It holds enough water to iron several items and I like that it can be used in vertical and horizontal positions as well. The storage pouch makes it easier to pack in my suitcase and now I won't leave home without it. Great product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great portable clothes steamer, a good time saver
reviews.reviewText: I usually iron wrinkles out of clothes. This clothes steamer is great time saver. It is portable, easy to take while travelling. Can be used with most fabrics, curtains, clothing, etc. Heats quickly, continuous steam after fully heated. Foldable handle. Also included is a fabric brush. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can’t Recommend due to Safety Concerns
reviews.reviewText: The product is easy to use, and the manual has clear instructions. It folds up to have a small profile and comes with its own travel bag. The product heats up quickly and produces a good amount of steam. Although, I did find the chord to be rather short, so if you can’t find an outlet very close to where you plan on steaming, than you are out of luck.However, the major issue with this product is that upon the product heating up, I immediately notice a very strong odor, like plastic burning. This is very concerning to say the least. The odor is not just cause for concern, but very harsh and noxious and lingers for a long time after use. It definitely raises serious health and safety concerns about the product.Bottomline, due to the aforementioned health and safety concerns, I can’t recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Produces a lot of good steam, but at the risk of safety.
reviews.reviewText: PROS:* The device produces a lot of steam very quickly, usually within the described 20 seconds of it being turned on.* There is a user manual (English) that is adequate for essential understanding.* There is contact information included in the package even though it looks like a disposable email.CONS:* Device electrical specification are designed for 110 VAC at 50 Hz. North American, including my community operates at 60 Hz.* Although the packaging claims to be CE certified (for the European domain), I do not see any evidence of American UL or Canadian CSA electrical certifications.* When in use, the device emits a harsh chemical burning-like odor as if plastic is melting.* One time when I installed the water reservoir, the main device case split open! I happen to have the device plugged in. This was a very dangerous safety situation. I was able to snap the device main casing back together, but it did not look very confidently designed. See the attached images.* There is no control for the volume of steam generated. You might find yourself refilled the water reservoir often.* If your garment has an acute crease, expect to use a traditional iron to clear it. This device doesn't seem to affect it.* Be careful with your free hand when using the device. Intermittently it will spit out a blob of extremely hot water. This will burn your free hand.SUMMARY:Functionally the product delivers what it said it does. But the harsh burning smell, the electrical certification inconsistency and the failed casing among the list of cons stages the product as being potentially unsafe. I believe the presented opinion rating is perhaps generous.Consumers beware.
